Title: Delves: The Underkeep
Description:
Who would've thought I'd be cozying up in a nerubian's lair!

There's a nasty named Zekvir threatening folks trying to explore the island. I've been asking the Weaver for any information she's got.

Supposedly, there's a place called the Underkeep that might have records on him. Let's check it out and see what we can find!
ObjectivesText: Find information on Zekvir within the Underkeep and complete the delve at any difficulty.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Brann Bronzebeard at Faerin's Advance.
RewardText:
Zekvir is an agent of Xal'atath! And he's trying to destroy any memories of Azeroth that he finds.

That makes our job of exploring more crucial than ever, $n. We won't give up, not even with Xal'atath's toady chasing us!

Objectives.Text: Zekvir's origins found within the Underkeep
The Underkeep completed on any difficulty
